name: Ls
tagline: Wrapper around the window.localStorage with useful functionality apart from normal get/set value. For example: JSON get/set, event registering for type create/update/remove/clear
body:
LS == Wrapper around the window.localStorage with useful functionality apart from normal get/set value.

For example:

  • JSON get/set,
  • Event registering for type create/update/remove/clear
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
